metadata.name: Future Cities #1
metadata.description:
Future Cities #1: Luis Fernando Vasquez plays f√∫tbol in the La Pradera Settlement, Lima. 

This photograph is from my Future Cities project about informal urban development in the world's cities. These photographs were made between 2010 and 2015. 

This is one of my favorite photographs from the project, because to me it represents hope and resilience in the face of a difficult environment. Physical prints of this photograph are in numerous private collections as well as the collection of the Philadelphia Museum of Art.

1/1 NFT

4500x3598 pixels
